meanings.definition: A musical instrument with a double reed and a curved shape.
meanings.sent1: The musician played the crumhorns beautifully in the concert.
meanings.sent2: The crumhorns added a unique sound to the medieval music ensemble.
meanings.sent3: During the performance, the crumhorns seemed to dance in the musician's hands.
meanings.sent4: The haunting melody of the crumhorns echoed through the ancient hall.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the crumhorns made them stand out among the other instruments.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see a collection of crumhorns from different eras.
meanings.sent2: The musicians each held their crumhorns ready to play in harmony.
meanings.sent3: The crumhorns on display looked like a colorful forest of musical instruments.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the crumhorns filled the room like a chorus of ancient voices.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the crumhorns told stories of bygone musical traditions.
